title: Operations Assistant – Electrical Trade Business (Remote)
job_overview:
"This job opportunity is with one of our valued clients, an established electrical trade business based in Perth, Australia. You’ll be working directly with our client, a reputable electrical trade company located in Perth, known for delivering high-quality services across commercial, residential, and industrial sectors.”


About the Role:
This is a dynamic client-facing admin and ops role for someone who is proactive, reliable, and organized. You’ll assist with job tracking, pricing, client quotes, reporting, and daily operational support,  all while using tools like Xero, ServiceM8, and Google Workspace.

Your ability to communicate clearly, follow procedures, and juggle competing priorities will be essential.

Key Responsibilities:
Operations, Quotes, and Client Support

Prepare and send quotes, tenders, and proposals using ServiceM8 and Xero
Follow up with clients to clarify requirements and finalize bookings
Assist with technician scheduling and dispatch coordination
Sales & Customer Service

Manage customer communications across email, phone, and WhatsApp
Track client queries and job feedback, escalating where needed
Support proactive follow-up and debt collection for outstanding invoices
Reporting & Data Entry

Maintain accurate operational records and time sheets
Monitor job progress and technician notes in job management systems
Assist with financial reporting and reconciliation using Xero
Process & Documentation Support

Update SOPs, compliance templates, and WHS/SWMS documentation
Ensure document accuracy and version control across projects
Flag discrepancies (e.g., technician timesheets vs. clock-ins) and resolve with team

Tools You’ll Use:
Xero (invoicing, reconciliation, expense claims, bills)
ServiceM8 (quotes, scheduling, job tracking)
Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Gmail, Drive)
Microsoft Excel (data accuracy and reporting)
Canva (light design for social media or documentation)
Meta Business Suite (basic post scheduling – optional)
WhatsApp, Email, Slack, Zoom or Google Meet

You Might Be a Great Fit If You:
Have 1–2 years of VA/Admin experience, especially in trades, construction, or service businesses
Are familiar with ServiceM8, Xero, and Australian business tools
Worked with or supported Australian clients or trade teams
Communicate clearly and can resolve client or technician issues proactively
Spot problems early and take action — like noticing repeated complaints from one tech and escalating
Stay organized even when managing 30–50+ invoices or multi-step processes
Are responsive during working hours and understand the importance of urgency in operations

What We Offer:
Competitive pay based on experience and performance
Remote, stable long-term role with regular reviews
Direct work with a supportive Aussie team
Exposure to modern software and operational systems

How to Apply:
If this sounds like you, kindly apply using this form Upgrade to see actual info

Your updated resume
A short  video intro explaining your experience
Include "Operations Assistant – Electrical" in your subject line
